cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 3793, Supporting Families of the Fallen Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 99 (Tuesday, June 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ROY:
H.R. 3793.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H2702]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: Supporting Families of the Fallen Act
